name: library-management-system
description: Library Management System - User CRUD Module

scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.dev:full: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start:dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.migration:run: cd backend && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.migration:generate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.seed: cd backend && npx prisma db seed
scripts.lint: cd backend && npm run lint && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
